disp-quote.p: “ I faced a challenge when I first took my pills. I felt weak when I woke up in the morning. And I thought I should stop taking [PrEP] but I decided I should not stop without consulting [a health worker] on what was taking place. When I consulted they told me that, ‘I should keep on taking them. Maybe they will work well on you. ’ As for now as I am taking [PrEP], and I no longer feel weak and no more nausea. It happened 1 week only. ”–Female, 31, commercial sex worker (RUR04) (AAM)
